name: saprozoic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
living or feeding on dead and decaying plant and animal matter, or relating to organisms that do this: Some of these species of fungus are saprozoic, and some can grow in darkness. In saprozoic nutrition, the organism secretes digestive enzymes directly onto the food and then absorbs it.
More examplesFewer examplesSaprozoic protozoa absorb carbohydrates and proteins that have been made soluble by bacteria.Spiders and houseflies are saprozoic organisms.A truly saprozoic organism would have a restricted diet.
